AcademicTermId.description: The Academic Term associated with the Academic Interest.

AccountId.description: The Account associated with the Academic Interest.

ContactId.description: The Contact associated with the Academic Interest.

ContactRequestId.description: The Contact Request associated with the Academic Interest.

EducationalInfoRequestId.description: Educational Info Request associated with the Academic Interest.

IndividualApplicationId.description: The Individual Application associated with the Academic Interest.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

LeadId.description: The lead for the person who expressed the Academic Interest.

LearningProgramId.description: The Learning Program associated with the Academic Interest.

Name.description: An auto-generated string or number assigned to the Academic Interest.

OpportunityId.description: The Opportunity associated with the Academic Interest.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns this record.

ReceivedDate.description: The date when the interest from the person was received.

Source.description: Specifies the source from where the Academic Interest was sent.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the Academic Interest.

Subscription.description: The subscription that the person is requesting.
